answers.answer: How far along are you? I would mention that to your Dr because it could be more serious than just swelling.
I hope not! Lol i do feel kinda droopy. And heavy. Idk maybe your right
Time to call the doctor. A little swelling in your hands and feet is normal, but it shouldn't be all over. Try to rest. Your family will understand, I promise.

The swelling is mainly in my face....does that matter? I just hate disappointing people. Plus my husband is working but my mom kinda blew that hes got a whole night planned. Idk what to do especially since i keep going to the hospital for this baby. Already twice.
Try to stay  away from salt and any foods that are high in sodium it will make you retain the water  your drinking
It could be preeclampsia! Call your doctor immediately! It's very serious! First sign is to be swollen in the face! How far are you along?
If it's mainly in your face I would give your dr a call ASAP! They may also want you to get checked out!!
Just to be on the safe side call you doctor and tell him what's going on!
Ok ok i can be hard headed but this time ill listen.  Thank u girls ima call.
Glad to say, i took a nap waiting for the doctor to call back, n swelling went down. Thank you ladies
Glad the swelling is down and that you got some rest! Keep us updated in what the dr says!

question: Any tricks to help with swelling? My face, legs, arms. Every thing is swollen. I feel over filled. N ive been drinking so much water i cant no more im ready to throw up.  Its my bday n i cant seem to wanna get up. My family is here n im tryna be a team player. All i wanna do is be in bed. Help please
title: besides water (kinda a rant)
